snippet: SAMUELS--Norman Edward. June 3, 1927 - February 27, 2016. Beloved husband, father, father-in-law, grandfather, uncle and friend to all. Loved by and loving towards everyone he met. Forever in our hearts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SAMUELS--Norman Edward. June 3, 1927 - February 27, 2016. Beloved husband, father, father-in-law, grandfather, uncle and friend to all. Loved by and loving towards everyone he met. Forever in our hearts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SAMUELS, NORMAN EDWARD
